=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap - DiaColloDB utilities: auto-magic upgrade: v0.08.x -> v0.09.x: MultiMapFile format

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap;
 
 ##========================================================================
 ## API
 
 $version = $CLASS_OR_OBJECT->toversion();

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap
provides a L<DiaColloDB::Upgrade|DiaColloDB::Upgrade>-compliant
package for upgrading a
L<DiaColloDB|DiaColloDB> database directory in-place.

Upgrade actions performed:

=over 4

=item *

updates MultiMapFile formats from v0.08.x to v0.09.x

=back


=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Upgrade::v0_09_multimap: API
=pod

=head2 API

=over 4

=item toversion

 $version = $CLASS_OR_OBJECT->toversion();

returns default target version; default just returns $DiaColloDB::VERSION

=item upgrade

 $bool = $CLASS_OR_OBJECT->upgrade($dbdir, \%info);

performs upgrade

=back

=cut
